title: looking for a duo game breaker
body:
im just looking for a fellow creative duo player who likes to experiment new ideas at a competitive level.

an open mind and a respect for the players that sometimes disagree with new tactics will be required. its not for the guide following type. the plan is to build strategies that break the meta. tweak working strats overtime in fine detail. and to record and publish results. 

I have plenty of friends but im after a special particular duo. the type that knows the game inside but wants to analyse it a little deeper, at different angles, for the fun of it. maybe go pro if we could be bothered :)
